author: senh
title: New United Airlines CEO Hospitalized
text: BING NEWS: United Airlines new CEO admitted to hospital United Airlines said Friday that its new CEO, Oscar Munoz, has been admitted to a hospital. The airline gave no explanation or details of his condition. The Wall Street Journal reports that Munoz suffered a heart attack. United Continental Holdings Inc ... 10/16/2015 - 7:17 am | View Link United Airlines says new CEO is in the hospital The new CEO of United Airlines has been admitted to a hospital. The Wall Street Journal reports that he suffered a heart attack. United Continental Holdings Inc. said Friday that Oscar Munoz's family informed the company that he was admitted to a hospital ... 10/16/2015 - 7:13 am | View Link UPDATE 2-United Airlines CEO suffered heart attack -WSJ Oct 16 (Reuters) - United Continental Holdings Inc Chief Executive Oscar Munoz has suffered a heart attack and is in a Chicago hospital, The Wall Street Journal reported on Friday. The company's board is waiting to hear from doctors and Munoz's family ... 10/16/2015 - 7:08 am | View Link United Airlines CEO Munoz Suffers heart attack: WSJ United Airlines CEO Munoz Suffers heart attack: WSJ United Airlines Chief Executive Officer Oscar Munoz has suffered a heart attack and is hospitalized in Chicago according to a report by the Wall Street Journal.
